{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-openstack/sdk/v2/go/openstack/compute"

)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := compute.GetAvailabilityZones(ctx, nil, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
